nodes.name: Configure_Extract_JSON_Fields
nodes.description: Extract fields from a JSON column in the table
nodes.title: Extract Response Field

nodes.name: Extract_CVE_Details
nodes.lql: `select get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.Modified') as CVE_Modified, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.Published') as CVE_Published, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.access.authentication') as CVSS_Authentication, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.access.complexity') as CVSS_Complexity, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.access.vector') as CVSS_Vector, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.cvss') as CVSS, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.id') as CVE_Id, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.impact.availability') as Availability_Impact, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.impact.confidentiality') as Confidentiality_Impact, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.impact.integrity') as Integrity_Impact, get_json_object(\`response\`, '$.summary') as CVE_Summary from Configure_Extract_JSON_Fields`
nodes.description: Extract fields from a JSON column in the table
nodes.title: Extract CVE Details

nodes.name: operator_loadList
nodes.description: This operator returns all the rows from a list
nodes.title: Load History

nodes.name: operator_loadList_1
nodes.description: This operator returns all the rows from a list
nodes.title: Load Pattern List

nodes.name: Add_Fields
nodes.lql: `SELECT concat('.*', cve_pattern, '.*') AS formatted_pattern, * FROM operator_loadList_1`
nodes.title: Format match pattern

nodes.name: operator_matchPattern
nodes.description: Match pattern column to stringToMatch column and assing tags based on a match.
nodes.title: Match Pattern

nodes.name: Create_a_filter
nodes.description: Filter rows with basic boolean statements
nodes.title: Create a filter

nodes.name: operator_joinTables
nodes.description: This operator joins tables based on columns in the parameters. Columns used for joining must be present in all tables, and they should not include other common fields
nodes.title: Join Tables

nodes.name: Create_a_filter_1
nodes.lql: `select * from operator_joinTables where ( CVSS >= '5' AND isnull(is_history) = 'true' )`
nodes.description: Filter rows with basic boolean statements
nodes.title: Create a filter

nodes.name: Extract_Report_Fields
nodes.lql: `select \`CVE_Id\` as CVE_Id, \`CVE_Modified\` as CVE_Modified, \`CVE_Published\` as CVE_Published, \`CVSS\` as CVSS, \`CVE_Summary\` as CVE_Summary, \`CVSS_Authentication\` as CVSS_Authentication, \`CVSS_Complexity\` as CVSS_Complexity, \`CVSS_Vector\` as CVSS_Vector from Create_a_filter_1`
nodes.description: Extract fields from a JSON column in the table
nodes.title: Extract Report Fields

nodes.name: operator_tableToHtmlString
nodes.description: This operator converts LQL table to HTML table
nodes.title: Table To HTML

nodes.name: Add_Email_Fields
nodes.lql: `SELECT "chris.botelho@logichub.com" AS email_recipient, "New CVE Notification" AS email_subject, * FROM operator_tableToHtmlString`
nodes.title: Add Email Fields

nodes.name: Extract_History_Fields
nodes.lql: `select \`CVE_Id\` as CVE_Id, \`CVE_Modified\` as CVE_Modified, \`CVE_Published\` as CVE_Published from Extract_Report_Fields`
nodes.description: Extract fields from a JSON column in the table
nodes.title: Extract History Fields

nodes.name: operator_appendToList
nodes.description: This operator appends its input table to the list, deduping the rows as needed
nodes.title: Append List

nodes.name: Web_API
nodes.description: Web API integration allows you to execute any Web API and retrieve results.
nodes.title: Web API
nodes.iconTitle: Integration: Web API - Execute Web API

nodes.name: Send_Email
nodes.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is a standard communication protocol for sending email messages on business networks and the Internet.
nodes.title: Send Email

descriptor.name: Web API
descriptor.description: Web API integration allows you to execute any Web API and retrieve results.

steps.name: web_api Authentication Information
steps.description: Enter authentication information for the web_api integration

inputs.description: Label for this integration instance.
inputs.label: Label

inputs.description: Define variables here to templatize integration connections and actions. For example, you can use https://www.{{hostname}}.com, where hostname is a variable defined in this input.
inputs.label: Reference Values

inputs.description: Select option to verify connecting server's SSL certificate (Default is Verify SSL Certificate)
inputs.label: Verify SSL

inputs.description: Upload a .p12 Client Certificate file (p12 file at action input takes precedence over connection)
inputs.label: Client Certificate

inputs.description: Enter password to read the client certificate
inputs.label: Client Certificate Password

actions.name: Execute Web API
actions.description: Execute given Web API and return the response

inputs.description: Request type to get the method name
inputs.label: Request type

inputs.description: Url Endpoint
inputs.label: URL

inputs.description: Web api request headers
inputs.label: Headers

inputs.description: Web api request parameters
inputs.label: Params

inputs.description: Web api request body
inputs.label: Body

inputs.description: Username for request
inputs.label: Username

inputs.description: Password for request
inputs.label: Password

inputs.description: Upload a .p12 Client Certificate file (p12 file at action input takes precedence over connection)
inputs.label: Client Certificate

inputs.description: Enter password to read the client certificate
inputs.label: Client Certificate Password

inputs.description: Select how to parse the response based on its expected format. (Default is "Raw" and will pass the full body to the response field). `File` will write the response to a file and return the file-id.
inputs.label: Expected Response Format

inputs.description: If server response is parsed as a list of values instead of a single value, return as individual rows for each value (Default is False)
inputs.label: Explode Results

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds (Default is 0 millisecond)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

failedAttempt.errorMessage: This imported connection is using a different version of the Web API (logichub.web_api) integration than what is currently available on this deployment. Please edit the connection to ensure it works correctly.

descriptor.name: SMTP
descriptor.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is a standard communication protocol for sending email messages on business networks and the Internet.

steps.name: SMTP Server and Account Authentication
steps.description: Enter authentication information for your SMTP connection

inputs.description: Label for this integration instance.
inputs.label: Label

inputs.description: Define variables here to templatize integration connections and actions. For example, you can use https://www.{{hostname}}.com, where hostname is a variable defined in this input.
inputs.label: Reference Values

inputs.description: Select option to verify connecting server's SSL certificate (Default is Verify SSL Certificate)
inputs.label: Verify SSL

inputs.description: Server name for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: SMTP Server Name

inputs.description: Server port for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: SMTP Server Port

inputs.description: Authentication type for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: Authentication type

inputs.description: Whether or not to use encryption
inputs.label: Use encryption

inputs.description: Email Address to send from
inputs.label: Email Address

inputs.description: Username if different from Email Address
inputs.label: Username

inputs.description: Password to log in with. Leave empty if using None Authentication type.
inputs.label: Password

actions.name: Send Email
actions.description: Sends an e-mail to a recipient using SMTP

steps.name: Create and Send Email
steps.description: Create and send an email using column names from the parent table

inputs.description: A column containing the subject title for e-mails

inputs.description: Column containing e-mail addresses to attach as cc on an outbound e-mail

inputs.description: Column containing e-mail addresses to attach as bcc on an outbound e-mail
inputs.label: BCC on outbound e-mail Column Name

inputs.description: Column containing one or more file IDs to attachment. (Can be a comma separated string of lhub_file_id values or a json dict in the format of {"<lhub_id>":"<file_name>"})
inputs.label: File Attachment

inputs.description: If no file name is provided, add this extension to attached files.
inputs.label: Attachment File Extension

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds (Default is 0 millisecond)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads
